ygData.subject: Re: Logo or Kinger first come first serve.
ygData.msgSnippet: Foxfingers stepped out in the open cautiously keeping his hand on the button to make his act look real. One Maximal life against at least four Predacons?

Foxfingers stepped out in the open cautiously keeping his hand on the button
to make his act look real. "One Maximal life against at least four
Predacons? sounds liker a victory for my side. You say I'm free to go? Prove
it, lead the way out, I'll follow." He had heard enough bravado from the
Predacon shedog.
----- Original Message -----
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, November 09, 2000 8:13 AM
Subject: Re: Logo or Kinger first come first serve.


> ::KitKat::
>
> She smiled. "First off, I'd like to keep my base intact. You use that
> bomb of yours and we are all dead. I value the lives of my team more
> than my hurt pride in the matter. Second, You seam to be very good at
> what you do. I wish to be allies instead of enemies. But, if you wish
> not to be allies, then after you have left my ship, we will be
> enemies. But I gave my word. And I must keep it. Honor demands it. No
> matter how I feel about it later, I must keep my word. Even now. yes
> I wouldn't mind turning you into scrap for what you did to my ship,
> but my word is binding. I can not go back on it."
>
> She waited. She knew no matter how the others would feel about this,
> she had to keep her promise and release this fox.
>
> "Now please, I have many things to deal with. Come out, and I will
> walk you out of my base. I wish no more damage. And I don't want to
> get blown up. So stick to my side and I shall make sure you get out.
> Do you understand? Please come out and then leave my ship. As I said,
> I value the lives of my pack. And I don't want to get blown to the
> pit myself either."
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > KitKats offer sounded to good to be true, he comes into her base,
> > steals genetic material, damages her home and she lets him walk
> out?
> > There was something about KitKat that he didn't trust. He had to
> > admit that for a Predacon "B" um I mean Witch she was atractive. He
> > just didn't want to be fooled by another pretty face. "You want to
> > know why I broke in here? I don't even know that, It's my function,
> > It's what I do." he knew that Name Function and online date were
> the
> > three things a POW could offer. "Now what makes me so special that
> > you'd go so far out of your way to track me down just to let me go
> > again?" He wasn't used to the offer she was making him. He wanted
> to
> > go free but he wanted to know why she was being such a nice puppy.
> >
>
>
>
>
>
>
